1�Ahead of you lies the Al Zahbi residential area.You may use the rooms within just as you would a Mog House in your home nation.
1�Ahead of you lies the Al Zahbi residential area.All adventurers must lease a Rent-a-Room if they wish to enter.
1�In the event that you decide to lease a Rent-a-Room, your stored items will be moved to Al Zahbi and you will be able to use your new room like the Mog House in your home country.
1�Lease a Rent-a-Room in Al Zahbi?Yes.No thanks.
1�It seems we are finished here. Congratulations--you now have an Al Zahbi Rent-a-Room at your disposal.
1�Do you want me to teach you about your Mog House again, kupo?
1�Ask about your Mog House again?Don't ask.Ask.
1�Master!I have something to tell you, kupo!
1�For your own safety, it is recommended you set the Mog House exit as your home point after changing jobs.
d.�Set this as current home point?Yes.No.
1�Give your moogle a vacation?HSure, kupo! No, your time is mine!
1�Oh, what a cruel, cruel master, kupo!!!
1�Papa Moogle will be entering the archery contest, so I want to bring him  $???? as a gift, kupo!
1�Mama Moogle always likes to dress up for the occasion, and  $???? would make the perfect present, kupo!
1�But I have no idea how to go about finding  $???? or  $????, kupo...I can't go home empty-handed, kupo...
1�Master!I'm overwhelmed by your kindness, kupo!!!
1�I'll bring you a nice present from the moogles' hometown, kupo!I'll be back in a few days, kupo!
1�Master!I'm back from my vacation, kupo!
1�Here's your present--a shiny new Mog Safe, kupo! Now you can store as many as 60 items, kupo!

1�Here's your present--the behemoth of Mog Safes, kupo! Now you can store as many as 70 items, kupo!
1�Master, Master!I have a favor to ask, kupo!
1�After resting on the #????, I noticed a letter had arrived from some old moogle friends, kupo! Will my magnanimous master give me some time off to go visit my old buddies?
1�Give your moogle some time off?Have fun, kupo!No, I am your only friend now!
1�Oh, thank you, master!My moogle friends live across the seas, so I have another favor to ask you, kupo!
1�The sun beats down mercilessly in the land beyond the west sea, so I need to take  $???? for my friends there, kupo!
1�And my other buddies need  $???? for the torrential rains that scour the lands across the east sea, kupo!

1�No doubt you have noticed the curious caskets scattered throughout the Nyzul Isle remnants.Our operatives have come to refer to these as ??vending boxes.??
1�Depositing Nyzul tokens into them will yield artifacts usable only in the immediate environs.By what ancient technology or magic they operate, we do not know.
1�And yet our research has not proved entirely fruitless.
1�Specifically, we have developed a means to manipulate these boxes so that your preferred items may be extracted with greater ease.
1�I would explain further, but the inner workings of this are beyond a layman like me.Simply convey to me your preferences, and enjoy the newfound convenience on your next expedition.

1�Investigators are frequently coming across artifacts within the remnants we are simply calling Nyzul ??tokens.??As a way of gauging your progress, the Commissions Agency will keep track of the number of tokens you have obtained.

1�Allow me to explain the mission list notations.
1�Selecting ??View mission list?? will display a list of mission titles.
1�Once a mission has been selected, you will see the following notations under the mission title:??Objective?? and ??Recruitment.??
1�??Objective?? refers to the condition that must be fulfilled in order for the mission to succeed.
1�However, mission objectives within the Nyzul Isle remnants are handled with the utmost confidentiality. Your mission orders will all be received from the on-site Assault commander.
1�The remnants on Nyzul Isle are divided into multiple floors. Once you have completed the objective received on a particular floor, the Assault commander will activate the Rune of Transfer.
1�Once the Rune of Transfer has been activated, you will have the choice of proceeding to the next floor, or suspending the mission and leaving the Assault area.
1�Do not be concerned; your mission will automatically be considered a success as long as the Rune of Transfer is used to exit the Assault area, no matter the floor.
1�Lastly, the objective for each floor will be relayed to you by the Assault commander via the Rune of Transfer.

1�??Recruitment?? refers to the level and number of mercenaries being recruited for the mission. The level displayed is a suggestion only, and any mission can be undertaken by a mercenary of level 50 or above.
1�However, since it is not possible to impose level restrictions within the Nyzul Isle Assault area, it is best to recruit members of the suggested level.
1�The number range displayed represents the minimum and maximum number of mercenaries allowed for the mission.
1�You must meet the minimum number requirement in order to begin an Assault mission.
1�This concludes the explanation of mission list notations.

1�Ah, astraria! Remarkable relics of an era long forgotten!
1�Ancient astronomical clocks, they are, once used by the denizens of these parts to predict changes in the weather and seasons...or so we surmise.

1�??Sanction?? is a magic spell that we use to observe and assess mercenaries' actions.
1�Defeating enemies while you have Sanction cast on you will raise your Imperial Standing. Also, the stronger the monsters you fight, the higher your Imperial Standing will become.
1�When fighting in a beastman stronghold that has taken the Astral Candescence, your Imperial Standing will rise by a significant amount as thanks for your participation in the recovery effort.
1�Sanction is also necessary in order to receive crystals from the enemies you defeat.
1�But you must take caution. Stepping too far out of the Empire's boundaries will cause Sanction to wear off.
1�You can raise your Imperial Standing by defeating enemies while you have Sanction cast on you.
1�Saving a captured prisoner in a beastman stronghold and submitting archaic mirrors to Imperial guards will also result in an increased Imperial Standing.
1�You can view your Imperial Standing by selecting ??Besieged?? under ??Region Info.??
1�You can also speak to me at any time to exchange your Imperial Standing credits for items.
1�What about Besieged?Never mind.Besieged basics.??Serpent Generals.??Astral Candescence in Al Zahbi.Astral Candescence with beastmen.Empire's current state of defense.
1�??Besieged?? occurs when the beastman armies breach the walls of Al Zahbi.
1�Everyone in town who is capable of wielding a weapon is called to action to defend Al Zahbi alongside the Imperial Army.
1�The beastmen's main purpose is to enter the Hall of Binding and wrest the ??Astral Candescence?? from the Empire's control.
1�You need not know what the Astral Candescence is.
1�All you must know is that it is your duty to protect the five Serpent Generals who hold the keys to the Hall of Binding, and to drive the beastman hordes from the Imperial capital.
1�The Empire's safety and its future rest on your capable shoulders!Rest assured that you will be rewarded for your efforts.
1�The Empire's defense is entrusted to five generals.
1�Each possesses a name corresponding to the symbols of the Empire--the serpents of flame, water, stone, gales, and sky.
1�Furthermore, the mirrors used to open the Hall of Binding are divided among their possession. Thus, the generals' fates determine the tide of battle.
1�If all five generals should fall in battle, the Hall of Binding will open, and the beastmen will be able to seize the Astral Candescence.
1�It is your responsibility to prevent such a disaster from happening. We are depending on you!
1�When the Astral Candescence is safely resting on its plinth in the Hall of Binding, it emanates waves that bestow special bonuses to Sanction.
1�The first bonus is a slight boost to the amount of experience points received from battles. You will receive this effect simply by having Sanction cast on you.
1�There are several other bonus effects, but you must sacrifice some of your Imperial Standing credits in order to receive them.
1�Keep in mind that the bonuses become more powerful with the number of times the Imperial capital is successfully defended.
1�Sanction's strength will reset if the beastmen succeed in invading the Hall of Binding, though.
1�The waves emanating from the Astral Candescence in Al Zahbi bring a multitude of blessings to all of us. You must not let it fall into the hands of the beastmen!

1�If the beastmen manage to take the Astral Candescence, its recovery will become our top priority. Find the coveted item on a plinth in one of the beastman strongholds and seize it back for the Empire!
1�We aren't quite sure what the beastmen are scheming to do with such power, but we do know that the Astral Candescence's waves can increase the beastmen's strength.
1�As if that weren't enough, we have recent reports that the beastmen have set ??archaic mirrors?? in their strongholds to magnify the power of the waves.

1�The basic rules of Brenner are as follows:
1�First, the participants divide into two teams. Each side's camp contains the same number of ??Flammen-Brenner.??
1�At the beginning of the match, half of each side's Flammen-Brenner will be ablaze with ??Flamme,?? or flame, while the other half will remain unlit.
1�Participants can seize a Flamme from the opposing side's Flammen-Brenner and carry it around the Isle.
1�The goal is to steal your opponent's Flamme and use them to light your side's Flammen-Brenner.
1�The side that succeeds in lighting all of its Flammen-Brenner will be declared the winner after a specified amount of time.
1�If neither side is victorious before the match ends, the outcome will be judged based on the score. The ??match score?? section of the rulebook contains more information on this subject.
1�Brenner is significantly divided into public and private matches. Official matches are held periodically according to level and feature general participation.
1�You cannot reserve the Isle when an official match is being held.
1�No items are necessary for participation, but a minor fee will be collected. You will be unable to participate if your level is too low.

1�The match outcome will be recorded unless the number of participants fails to exceed 
� members, or if there are fewer than 
 members in a match where the two sides' numbers differ. In such cases, the game will be considered a training match and will not be recorded.
1�Private matches require a reservation, and participation may be limited. The Master of Ceremonies (MC) can freely adjust the rules and control match proceedings.
1�??LS Liga?? is a form of private match. You can learn more about LS Liga by speaking to a Marshal.
1�A Flammen-Brenner is a device that contains a Flamme (flame). The Flammen-Brenner is covered by a grate that will open after taking a set amount of damage, exposing the Flamme.
1�The participants must utilize this chance to seize the Flamme before the grate recloses. Once the grate is closed, the Flammen-Brenner will begin recovering from the damage it has been dealt.
1�If you manage to open the opposing team's Flammen-Brenner and capture their Flamme, you should make haste to light one of the Flammen-Brenner on your side.
1�After a certain amount of time, the Flamme will burn out and the opposing team's Flammen-Brenner will be relit.
1�Also, please note that you cannot quicken your pace using any special abilities while you are in possession of a Flamme.
1�In the event that neither side fulfills the conditions for victory, the outcome of the match will be evaluated based on score.

1�Ten points are awarded to each side for every lit Flammen-Brenner, while one point is awarded whenever a Flamme is captured, used to light a Flammen-Brenner, or recaptured from an opponent. One point is also awarded for protecting the Flammen-Brenner for a certain period of time.
1�Like Ballista, quarry (/quarry) can be used while playing Brenner. Participants may use this ability to dig up Petras and temporary items.
1�However, unlike Ballista Petras, Brenner Petras have no effect on the match score. You can trade a Petra to a Pursuivant to recover your HP and MP at no expense to TP.
1�Sprint cannot be used while carrying a Petra. Also, please note that the scout ability cannot be used in Brenner.
1�Petras will be lost in the event of a KO, but can be carried over from one match to another.
1�The sprint (/sprint) ability can be used to increase the player's speed when not in possession of a Flamme or Petras.
1�In the event of a KO, you will be returned to your team's camp. However, recovery will take longer the more often you fall in battle.
1�In other words, you will receive a penalty if you fall immediately after recovering from KO. In addition, your TP will be reduced to zero and you will lose any Petras in your possession.

1�Once-in-a-lifetime meetings make for wonderful stories, but no treasure can compare to being part of a group of friends you can call home.
1�Linkshell concierges such as myself bring together adventurers of similar interests.
1�In a word, we match adventurers looking for linkshells with those linkshells interested in taking in new members.
1�I accept %???? from linkshells the world over and distribute them to appropriate adventurers.
1�This service is provided by the Adventurers' Mutual Aid Network, and as such, anyone working for Vana'diel's greater good is eligible to participate.
1�Additionally, please be aware that I am only able to offer you one #???? per day.

1�It is worth noting that each concierge may only register a maximum of 
� linkshells.
1�Once the number of registrations has hit the limit, existing registrations will be canceled in order of oldest to newest.
1�?Server maintenances will also immediately cancel all registrations, so be sure to keep your information up-to-dat
1�A manual describing proper chat manners floats in front of you.

1�Perhaps consider starting with a simple greeting. Something like...
1�??Hello, everyone. My name's  . Nice to meet you!??
1�Of course, injecting your own personal flavor may act as a conversation starter and help people to remember you.
1�No matter which route you choose, make sure to always remain polite. There is no better way to start a friendship off on the right foot.
1�When speaking with others, it's critical to listen and be mindful of what they say.
1�Always talking and never listening may come across as rude.
1�Another important point is to always be mindful of the listener. How would you feel if someone said that to you? Think carefully before sending someone a message.
1�It also helps to be clear and concise.
1�Being vague might cause others to get the wrong impression.
1�Be extremely careful when giving out personal information such as your address or telephone number.
1�Furthermore, refrain from making disparaging or aggressive remarks.
1�Once you are close to someone, you may be more comfortable letting your hair down, but it is strongly recommended that you refrain from any actions that may be construed as harassment.
1�After joining a linkshell, you may find that you have difficulty participating in conversation or that your personality is too different from the other members.
